title: Authors and Citation
text: Xiao S (2023). PCAperm: Permutation Test Principal Components Analysis. R package version 0.1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {PCAperm: Permutation Test for Principal Components Analysis},   author = {Shiying Xiao},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

title: PCAperm
text: goal PCAperm implement permutation test principal components analysis (PCA).

title: PCAperm
text: can install development version PCAperm GitHub :

title: Detailed PCA — detailedPCA
text: X complex matrix (data frame) serves data principal components analysis, featuring variables arranged columns observations rows. center logical value (default = TRUE) indicating whether variables shifted zero centered. scale logical value (default = TRUE) indicating whether variables scaled unit variance analysis takes place.

title: Detailed PCA — detailedPCA
text: list containing following components: X value rotated data (centred (scaled requested) data multiplied rotation matrix). sdev standard deviations principal components, calculated square roots eigenvalues covariance/correlation matrix. calculation actually done singular values data matrix. eigval eigenvalues covariance/correlation matrix, representing variance principal components. calculation actually done singular values data matrix. pctvar percentage variance explained principal component. rotation matrix variable loadings (.e., matrix whose columns contain eigenvectors). indexload index loadings variables. correlation correlations variables principal component. Psi Psi index, depends magnitude eigenvalues taken correlation matrix data set. $$\Psi = \sum(\lambda_i-1)^2,$$ \(\lambda\) eigenvalue. Phi Phi statistic, measures average level correlation among variables. $$\Phi = \sqrt{\frac{\sum\lambda_i^2-p}{p(p-1)}},$$ \(\lambda\) eigenvalue, \(p\) number variables. center centering used, FALSE. scale scaling used, FALSE.

title: Detailed PCA — detailedPCA
text: Gleason, T. C. Staelin, R. (1975). Proposal Handling Missing Data. Psychometrika, 40(2), 229--252. Mardia, K. V., Kent, J. T. Bibby, J. M. (1979). Multivariate Analysis. London, UK: Academic Press. Becker, R. ., Chambers, J. M. Wilks, . R. (1988). New S Language. Wadsworth & Brooks/Cole. Computer Science Series, Pacific Grove, CA. Vieira, Vasco M. N. C. S. (2012). Permutation Tests Estimate Significances Principal Components Analysis. Computational Ecology Software, 2(2), 103--123. Venables, W. N. Ripley, B. D. (2013). Modern Applied Statistics S-PLUS. Springer Science & Business Media.
